item.title: Querying Watchlists
item.description:
special thanks to @Ofer_Shezaf for showing me the new function call.
Watchlists Watchlists are a feature of Microsoft Sentinel that provide great flexibility and useability. They allow for user-defined tables that can be used in KQL queries to provide additional data. By uploading data using CSV files, users control the data that are in the watchlists and that data can be modified and new rows added as needed.
Watchlists provide a "searchkey" field that is unique across the watchlist and can be used to reference an individual row as discussed below.
Querying Watchlists The Microsoft Se...
